name: 3 hands. Multitasking.
description:
Think You're Multitasking?

Sometimes it happens, it's important to do several things at once.
This game allows you to train attention for tracking multiple objects simultaneously.

There are three screens.
Screen 1: control the platform by left or right button to the ball does not burst.
Screen 2: control the ball screen by up or down button to avoid a collision with a ninja - star.
Screen 3: jump over the flying shuriken by the center button.

Control multiple screens simultaneously!
Train your Multitasking!
Test your skill!

The game is absolutely free. The game does not contain internal purchases or other hidden charges.
